content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;

SELECT 
    cafv_eligibility_ID,
    classification
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'cafv_eligibility.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS cafv_eligibility
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        cafv_eligibility_ID SMALLINT '$.cafvEligibility',
        classification VARCHAR(100)
    );

---Process multi line file
SELECT 
    cafv_eligibility_ID, classification
    FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'cafv_eligibility_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS cafv_eligibility
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH (
        cafv_eligibility_ID SMALLINT '$.cafvEligibility',
        classification VARCHAR(100)
    );
